resources.string: The DPM App is a Prototype version of a degree planner only and NOT an official study plan. It is intended that students shall use this to get an understanding of the pathways offered and then discuss study plans with a Wintec representative. Pathways may change accordingly making older versions redundant - Wintec takes no responsibility of outdated pathways or information displayed on the app.

Version 1.0
 This is a project created for Wintec by the group CocoaTeam composed by the members
 Ling Zhang
 Huei Jong Tu
 Chrisita Rajan
 Juan Cabello
 Venkateswar Reddy Raavi
